name: Tentacool

abilities.name: Cowardice
abilities.text: At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may return Tentacool to your hand. (Discard all cards attached to Tentacool.) This power can't be used the turn you put Tentacool into play or if Tentacool is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

flavorText: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

strengths: Cowardice allows instant bounce to hand
Can avoid being knocked out by bouncing
weaknesses: Can't use Cowardice turn played or when statused
counters: OHKOs before Cowardice can be used

competitiveHistory: Tentacool's Cowardice power was unique and useful for denying prize cards by bouncing before being knocked out. However, the 30 HP made it vulnerable to OHKOs before the power could be activated. It saw niche play in certain control strategies.

rulings.ruling: Cowardice can be used at any time during your turn before attacking, not just when Tentacool is Active.
All cards attached to Tentacool are discarded when using Cowardice.
Cowardice cannot be used the same turn Tentacool was played from your hand.
If Tentacool is your only Pokemon in play, you cannot use Cowardice.
